title: Week 15 Picks Against the Spread, Best Bets, Gambling Advice (Football 12/13)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco and R.J. White for Week 15 gambling advice, covering all 15 games on Sunday and Monday. The guys discuss Cowboys-Rams (5:30), Bills-Steelers (11:15), Falcons-49ers (14:50), Vikings-Chargers (18:50), Jags-Raiders (23:00) Dolphins-Giants (28:00), Eagles-Redskins (32:45), Colts-Saints (35:30), Patriots-Bengals (42:35), Bears-Packers (45:05), Texans-Titans (48:25), Seahawks-Panthers (51:40), Broncos-Chiefs (54:00), Browns-Cardinals (56:45) and Bucs-Lions (59:40).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
